heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_furion
heroes.bio_loc: When Verodicia, Goddess of the Woods, had finished filling in the green places, having planted the coiled-up spirit in the seed, having lured the twining waters from deep within the rock, having sworn the sun its full attention to the growing things, she realized that her own time had reached its end, and like one of the leaves whose fate she had imprinted in the seed, she would fall without seeing the fruiting of her dream. It pained her to leave the world bereft, for the sprouts had not yet broken through the soil--and they would be tender and vulnerable to every sort of harm. She found in her seed pouch one last seed that she had missed in the sowing. She spoke a single word into the seed and swallowed it as she fell. Her vast body decomposed throughout the long winter, becoming the humus that would feed the seedlings in the spring. And on the morning of the vernal equinox, before the rest of the forest had begun to wake, that last seed ripened and burst in an instant. From it stepped Nature's Prophet, in full leaf, strong and wise, possessing Verodicia's power to foresee where he would be needed most in defense of the green places--and any who might be fortunate enough to call him an ally.
heroes.hype_loc: Whether in the thick of battle or gathering resources for his next assault, Nature's Prophet seems to be everywhere. Teleporting at will to any location and instantly creating an army of violent trees to fight for him, he attacks where enemies least expect.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Able to teleport to any location on the map at will

facets.description_loc: Allies inside and nearby on the outside of Sprout are healed over time.
facets.name: furion_soothing_saplings

facets.description_loc: Nature's Call creates only {s:bonus_max_treants} Treant that has more health, more damage, and is Reinforced.
facets.name: furion_ironwood_treant

abilities.name: furion_sprout
abilities.desc_loc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, damaging and trapping it in place and providing vision in a %vision_range% radius.
abilities.lore_loc: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
notes_loc: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
A Tango that consumes a tree created by Sprout provides the standard healing effects.
facets_loc: Allies inside and nearby on the outside of the sprout are healed over time. Allied buildings are healed at a %building_healing_pct%%% rate.

abilities.name: furion_teleportation
abilities.desc_loc: Teleports to any point on the map. Gains a barrier after arriving to its destination.
abilities.lore_loc: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
notes_loc: Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

abilities.name: furion_force_of_nature
abilities.desc_loc: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
abilities.lore_loc: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
notes_loc: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.
facets_loc: Summons a reduced number of stronger Treants with reinforced damage.

abilities.name: furion_curse_of_the_forest
abilities.desc_loc: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within %range% range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within %radius% radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
abilities.lore_loc: Though powerful, Nature's Prophet's gifts do not include all-sight, and he must rely heavily upon reconnaissance and aid from a long-standing network of stalwart friends.

abilities.name: furion_spirit_of_the_forest
abilities.desc_loc: Nature's Prophet gains %damage_per_tree_pct%%% bonus damage for each tree within %radius% and a multiplier of that same bonus for each treant within %radius_treant% distance of him.

abilities.name: furion_wrath_of_nature
abilities.desc_loc: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
notes_loc: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
abilities.scepter_loc: Lowers cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from %scepter_min_entangle_duration%s up to %scepter_max_entangle_duration%s seconds at max bounce.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_furion
talents.desc_loc: Also affects Spirit of the Forest
